short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A YouTube extension to make your life easier!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily navigate between YouTube, Spotify and Genius!

This extension will add new buttons on YouTube, Spotify and Genius that will automatically search for the song on the respective platform.

Buttons will be added to the following locations:
 - YouTube videos
- YouTube context menus
 - Spotify
 - Genius search results page
 - Genius song page
